etymology.interpretation: The character 麻(má, "hemp") visually represents hemp plants with fibers or threads. It shows the processing of hemp as an essential plant material.

examples.chinese: 这种衣服用麻纺织(這種衣服用麻紡織)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yīfú yòng má fǎngzhī.
examples.english: This kind of clothing is woven with hemp.

examples.chinese: 吃了太多辣椒(吃了太多辣椒)，手就会变得麻(手就會變得麻)。
examples.pinyin: Chī le tài duō làjiāo, shǒu jiù huì biàn dé má.
examples.english: After eating too many chili peppers, the hand becomes numb.

examples.chinese: 他跑步过后(他跑步過後)，双腿常常感到麻(雙腿常常感到麻)。
examples.pinyin: Tā pǎobù guòhòu, shuāngtuǐ chángcháng gǎndào má.
examples.english: After running, his legs often feel numb.
